content: Oct 12 A former Chemours Co employee has been indicted on U.S. charges that he conspired to steal trade secrets related to its lucrative sodium cyanide business and monetize them with Chinese investors  U.S. prosecutors said on Thursday.
name: Chemours Company (The)
title: Ex-Chemours employee accused by U.S. of trade secrets theft scheme

content: DuPont and Chemours Co have agreed to pay $671 million in cash to settle thousands of lawsuits involving a leak of a toxic chemical used to make Teflon  the companies said on Monday.
name: Chemours Company (The)
title: DuPont settles lawsuits over leak of chemical used to make Teflon

content: Feb 13 DuPont and Chemours Co have agreed to pay $671 million in cash to settle thousands of lawsuits involving a leak of a toxic chemical used to make Teflon  the companies said on Monday.
name: Chemours Company (The)
title: UPDATE 2-DuPont settles lawsuits over leak of chemical used to make Teflon

content: Nov 7 Chemours Co will increase prices of titanium dioxide and related products by a small margin  Chief Executive Mark Vergnano said on Monday  a day after the chemicals company reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit.
name: Chemours Company (The)
title: Chemours to modestly hike titanium dioxide prices - CEO

content: BOSTON  July 26 Hedge fund manager David Einhorn told investors that he thinks performance chemicals company Chemours Co will see its earnings grow as prices for titanium dioxide (TiO2)  used in the food and cosmetic industries  recover.
name: Chemours Company (The)
title: Einhorn's Greenlight sees room for Chemours to grow  stock climbs

content: NEW YORK  July 8 U.S. jurors ordered DuPont  on Friday to pay an additional $500 000 in punitive damages to a man who said he developed testicular cancer from exposure to a toxic chemical used to make Teflon at one of its plants  according to a lawyer for the plaintiff.
name: Chemours Company (The)
title: UPDATE 3-DuPont must pay extra $500 000 in lawsuit over Teflon-making chemical
